name: vstatus
description: Generates an image file containing the information like, what workspace the user is on, what file is he editing and since how long and so on.

commands.title: Check vstatus running fine or no.

vstatus.interval.description: The interval for how frequently the extension extracts workspace information, in seconds. For example, if set to 10, the extension will retrieve workspace data every 10 seconds.

vstatus.serverurl.description: The URL of the server deployed (probably on vercel).

vstatus.apikey.description: The api key you have in .env variables of the server

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
